name: The Breacher (bidgles13)
description:
In this small puzzle game, the objective is to line up the gates so you can fire a cannon through them to break down the door. Can you make it to the evil king?

Use the red arrows at the top and bottom of each gate to line them and clear a path for the breacher's bullet.

Once you line up the gates, press the red button on the cannon to fire the breacher.
